languages.text: "Я вижу, как ты пытаешься управлять мной, взывая к ее нечестивому призраку. Прекрати, или будешь осужден{mf||а} за попытку вмешательства в правосудие Его!"
"I see how you are trying to control me by invoking her unholy ghost. Stop or you will be convicted of attempting to meddle in His justice!"
languages.original_text: "Я вижу, как ты пытаешься управлять мной, взывая к ее нечестивому призраку. Прекрати, или будешь осужден{mf||а} за попытку вмешательства в правосудие Его!"

traits.locale_text: "I see how you are trying to control me by invoking her unholy ghost. Stop or you will be convicted of attempting to meddle in His justice!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "I see how you are trying to control me by invoking her unholy ghost. Stop or you will be convicted of attempting to meddle in His justice!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “我看得出来，你是打算召唤她的邪恶灵魂来干扰我。赶紧闭嘴，否则我会认为，你是在打算干涉神皇的正义！”
languages.original_text: "I see how you are trying to control me by invoking her unholy ghost. Stop or you will be convicted of attempting to meddle in His justice!"

traits.locale_text: “我看得出来，你是打算召唤她的邪恶灵魂来干扰我。赶紧闭嘴，否则我会认为，你是在打算干涉神皇的正义！”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「お前は彼女の不浄の霊を呼び起こす事で、私を支配しようとしている。今すぐやめろ。さもなければ、神の正義に干渉しようとした罪で有罪にする！」
languages.original_text: "I see how you are trying to control me by invoking her unholy ghost. Stop or you will be convicted of attempting to meddle in His justice!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は彼女の不浄の霊を呼び起こす事で、私を支配しようとしている。今すぐやめろ。さもなければ、神の正義に干渉しようとした罪で有罪にする！」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Veo cómo intenta controlarme invocando a su fantasma impío. ¡Deténgase o se le condenará por intentar entrometerse en Su justicia!».
languages.original_text: "I see how you are trying to control me by invoking her unholy ghost. Stop or you will be convicted of attempting to meddle in His justice!"

traits.locale_text: «Veo cómo intenta controlarme invocando a su fantasma impío. ¡Deténgase o se le condenará por intentar entrometerse en Su justicia!».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Ich sehe, wie Ihr versucht, mich zu kontrollieren, indem Ihr ihren unheiligen Geist anruft. Unterlasst das unverzüglich, sonst werdet Ihr wegen versuchter Perversion seiner Gerechtigkeit verurteilt!"
languages.original_text: "I see how you are trying to control me by invoking her unholy ghost. Stop or you will be convicted of attempting to meddle in His justice!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe, wie Ihr versucht, mich zu kontrollieren, indem Ihr ihren unheiligen Geist anruft. Unterlasst das unverzüglich, sonst werdet Ihr wegen versuchter Perversion seiner Gerechtigkeit verurteilt!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Je vois clair dans votre jeu : vous cherchez à me manipuler en invoquant l'esprit impie d'Aspyce. Cessez immédiatement ou je vous condamne pour entrave à Sa justice ! »
languages.original_text: "I see how you are trying to control me by invoking her unholy ghost. Stop or you will be convicted of attempting to meddle in His justice!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vois clair dans votre jeu : vous cherchez à me manipuler en invoquant l'esprit impie d'Aspyce. Cessez immédiatement ou je vous condamne pour entrave à Sa justice ! »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Onun din dışı hayaletinin ismini anarak beni kontrol etmeye çalıştığını görebiliyorum. Buna bir son ver yoksa O'nun adaletine müdahale etme teşebbüsünden suçlu bulunursun!"
languages.original_text: "I see how you are trying to control me by invoking her unholy ghost. Stop or you will be convicted of attempting to meddle in His justice!"

traits.locale_text: "Onun din dışı hayaletinin ismini anarak beni kontrol etmeye çalıştığını görebiliyorum. Buna bir son ver yoksa O'nun adaletine müdahale etme teşebbüsünden suçlu bulunursun!"
